text: The 2010 Nippon Professional Baseball season is the 61st season since the NPB was reorganized in . ==Final standings== ===Central League=== ===Pacific League=== ==Climax Series== Note: All of the games that are played in the first two rounds of the Climax Series are held at the higher seed's home stadium.
